title: Two-wheeler sales volume to fall for third straight fiscal year: Crisil
description: The decline in sales volume in the current financial year is expected on an already-low base after two consecutive years of decline -- at 13 per cent in fiscal 2021 and 18 per cent in fiscal 2020, the domestic ratings agency said in a statement.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
